title: Wrapped with Care
description:
Bees wax was is a sticky substance produced naturally from bees, traditionally used as the ’first plastic’. Wraps made out of beeswax are hence more organic and pliable offering a sustainable and long-lasting solution to plastic wraps.

In a bid to bring brand personality alongside a tactical product-driven communication approach, we highlight, through a quirky 30 sec YouTube ad, the sticky situation plastic-use brings and how Gaia’s sustainable and long-lasting wraps are the perfect antidote.
author: Team: Taylor Henderson; Risha George;

title: Ben&Jerry’s - Try them chilled!
